alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:21PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Lexington and northwestern Richland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harbison State Forest, or over Irmo, moving northwest at 5 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, Irmo, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Oak Grove, Ballentine, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Seven Oaks, Lighthouse Marina, Lake Murray Marina, Upper Richland Fire Station, Pine Island, and White Rock. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 near mile marker 0. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 59 and 69. Interstate 26 between mile markers 95 and 108. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
